title: Pressure Swing Adsorption (PSA) Optimization Design for Radioactive Krypton Removal Process

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Students learn mathematical modeling of PSA processes and optimization algorithm applications, requiring understanding of krypton-85 radioactive decay characteristics

learning_goals: Explain the impact of PSA process design variables (pressure, time, adsorbent quantity) on krypton removal efficiency
Execute PSA process optimization workflows using genetic algorithms with simulation tools
Propose redesign strategies for PSA systems according to changing operational conditions through iterative learning design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
